channel.title: Help if you dont mind
channel.description:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler. java:402) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:3 3) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:71) Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
this is what it says everytime i click rin server someone help please and thank you

item.title: Help if you dont mind
item.dc:creator: @mintzero4 mintzero4
item.description:
@mintzero4 wrote:

@echo off
title Running Project Ecko V9.0
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\java.exe” -Xmx1500m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Help if you dont mind
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

[quote=“mintzero4, post:3, topic:415103”]Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Dexter
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Dexter
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: Dexter. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

Thats it[/quote]
Not that, I mean do this…Right click on “Run”-Click “Edit” and copy and paste it on hre.
